\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\cdots } & {R^{(X^k)}\oplus R^{(X^{k-1})}} & {R^{(X^{k+1})}\oplus R^{(X^{k})}} & {\cdots } \\
	{\cdots } & {X^k} & {X^{k+1}} & {\cdots }
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\binom {0 \ 1}{0 \ 0}}", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{p_{X^k} \circ (1_{R^{(X^k)}},R^{(d^{k-1})})}"', from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{p_{X^{k+1}} \circ (1_{R^{(X^{k+1})}},R^{(d^{k})})}", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{d^k}", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
